mention.text: He that shall live this day , and see old age , Will yearly on the vigil feast his neighbours , And say ' To-morrow is Saint Crispian : ' Then
Will yearly on the vigil feast his neighbours , And say ' To-morrow is Saint Crispian
the king , Bedford and Exeter , Warwick and Talbot , Salisbury and Gloucester
me Shall be my brother ; be he ne'er so vile
this day to the ending of the world
my brother ; be he ne'er so vile
gentlemen in England now a-bed Shall
